results.name: Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Breakpoint Trial

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0GHz with Duo Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 3.2GHz with Quad Core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
